responses.response: smtp;450 4.2.0 <email@example.com>: Recipient address rejected: example.com greylisted for 60 seconds by ZEROSPAM

codes.description:
The transaction failed permantently. The server will not try to send the message again. This is used as a general error code, so there are many reasons why you could be seeing it.

Itâ€™s common for email service providers to add a status code (5.1.1) after the SMTP reply code (smtp;550) for additional categorization of the issue.

responses.response: smtp;554 5.7.1 <email@example.com>: Recipient address rejected: Not in recipient list
